What does quality permanent makeup look like?

Answer: You can't even tell that it's there.

But the client looks undeniably more beautiful.

What is GGB Academy?

GGB Academy is one of the most prestigious Permanent Makeup Training Schools in the US. We have developed proprietary training programs using our own brand products, and we create the most successful artists in the world.

What sets GGB training apart is that we prepare our students for the most challenging situations.

During the training process, our students work on life models, learning how to approach real-life situations.

We teach advanced, non-painful and safe methods of application.

We have developed our own brand best quality needle cartridges, drawing tools and equipment for PMU application.

Our brand pigments are safe, clean, and fade gracefully over time. We have everything you need to become a successful artist.
